description: This file defines the main page component for a web-based chess application, managing state and integrating components like the chessboard, move list, status bar, and game controls.

methods.name: handleNewGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game, resetting FEN, move list, and status messages.

methods.name: handleUndo
methods.description: Undoes the last move by removing it from the move list.

methods.name: handleRedo
methods.description: Placeholder for redoing a move (not yet implemented).

methods.name: handleSetFEN
methods.description: Loads a custom position from a FEN string, resetting moves and updating status.

methods.name: handleStatusUpdate
methods.description: Updates the status message, linked to the ARIA live region for accessibility.
